short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert Sinhala Unicode from Google Translator to FM Fonts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to Use:
1. Visit Google Translator.
2. Switch on the "à¶…" button.
3. Translate your text and click the Google's "Copy" button as usual.
- Text will be copied in Non-Unicode (FMAbhaya Font) format.

Developer:
Thambaru Wijesekara

Special thanks to:
UCSC LTRL and Malinthe Samarakon for the Unicode converter code.
